body_html:
@inakaaay For Bazel build, this is done by running ./configure in Tensorflow directory.
Alternately we also provide a Dockerfile that pre-configures this. https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/object_detection/dockerfiles/android/Dockerfile
body_text:
@inakaaay For Bazel build, this is done by running ./configure in Tensorflow directory.
Alternately we also provide a Dockerfile that pre-configures this. https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/object_detection/dockerfiles/android/Dockerfile
body:
@inakaaay For Bazel build, this is done by running ./configure in Tensorflow directory. 
Alternately we also provide a Dockerfile that pre-configures this. https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/research/object_detection/dockerfiles/android/Dockerfile
